name.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・アルティマ

description.en: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ar: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.br: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.cns: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle verhindert den Verlust der Ultimativen Waffe, wenn das Upgrade fehlschlägt. Lege die Schriftrolle in das entsprechende Feld im Upgrade-Menü, bevor du das Upgrade versuchst. Die Schriftrolle wird während des Vorgangs verbraucht.
description.fi: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fil: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fr: Ce parchemin permet d'empêcher la perte liée à l'échec d'amélioration d'Arme Ultime. Pour l'utiliser, placez le parchemin au bon endroit dans le menu d'amélioration avant de tenter l'amélioration. Le parchemin est consommé durant la manipulation.
description.id: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.it: This scroll prevents the loss of Ultimate Weapon for upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.jp: この巻物は、アップグレードの失敗によるアルティマ武器の喪失を防ぎます。使用するには、アップグレードを試みる前に、アップグレードメニューの適切なボックスにスクロールを配置します。スクロールはプロセスで消費されます。

description.sp: Este pergamino evita la pérdida del arma definitiva por falla en la actualización. Para usarlo, coloque el pergamino en el cuadro correspondiente en el menú de actualización antes de intentar la actualización. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
